overview: Catalina Video knows how to please different tastes. Like the insatiable longing some men get for the taste of leather. Butch guys, hairy guys, guys who look like men, real men. Sometimes you just need that rough hardcore action. No kids' stuff. Men in uniforms, dressed up and ready to be served. Men in glory holes, men in slings, men in chains. It's just the beginning of what you really want when your mouth is watering for The Taste of Leather.
title: The Taste of Leather
